content.rendered:
Directed by Tim Mielants. Fien Troch. Philip Barantini.

Written by Tony Schumacher.

Cast  Romi Hyland-Rylands( Tilly Carson). MyAnna Buring( Kate Carson). Adelayo Adedayo( Rachel Hargreaves). Mark Womack( Barry). Josh Finan( Marco). Emily Fairn( Casey). Philip Shaun McGuinness( Ian). Warren Brown( Raymond Mullen). Ian Hart( Carl Sweeney). Faye McKeever( Jodie Sweeney). Philip Barantini( Steve). Elizabeth Berrington( Lynne Renfrew). Christine Tremarco( Dr. Diane Gallagher). David Loy( Marcus). Rob Pomfret( David). Jude Cooper-Kelly( Adam Mullen). Kerrie Hayes( Ellie Mullen). Maud Druine( Ruth). Lois Cringle( Lexie Sweeney). Rita Tushingham( June Carson). Dave Hart( Phil O’Rourke). James Nelson-Joyce( Greg Gallagher). David Bradley( Davey). Karl Collins( Colin Westfield). Philip Whitchurch( Joe). Amaka Okafor( D.I. Deborah Barnes). Marji Campi( Elizabeth). Laurel Waghorn( Laura). Jake Abraham( Car Park Attendant). Paul Campion( Doctor Sutherland). Christian Waite( Osbourne Stunt Performer). Victor McGuire( Trevor). Kieran Urquhart( Paul). Sylvie Gatrill( Mary). Hannah Riley( Woman in Shop). Tahir Shah( Omar). Steve O’Keefe( Taxi Driver). William Travis( Stew). Roy Brandon( Neighbour). Chris Jack( Hotel Manager). Pat Winker( Mrs. Robinson). Harry Burke( Liam). Dominic Carter( Sgt Bernie Wilson). Debra Redcliffe( Iris). Jake Hagan( Jason). Jay Roberts( Mark). John David-Evans( Senior Fire Officer). Felipe Pacheco( Ryan). Sonny Walker( Stevo Marsh). Duggal Ram( D.C. Jason Younger). Connor Dempsey( Kyle). Aimee Palmer( Lisa). Nieve Hearity( Karen). James Ledsham( Enno). Chris Cairns( Attendant). Dave Hill( Billy). Michael Starke( Kevin). David Ayres( Andy). Daryl Rowlands( Scally Girl). Matthew Cottle( Father Liam Neeson). Jane Hogarth( Mrs. Jones). Keith Carter( Smiggy). Kalli Tant( Alana Jones). Karl Kennedy-Williams( Fireman). Joe Macaulay( Terry Ayres). Felipe Gebara Pacheco( Ryan)

Language English.

Producers Laurence Bowen. Toby Bruce. Chris Carey. Susan Dunn. Nawfal Faizullah. Rebecca Ferguson. Martin Freeman. Mona Qureshi. Barrington Paul Robinson. Phill Reeves. Charlie Greenstein.

Production Dancing Ledge Productions. British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC). Liverpool Film Office.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 7

Status OnGoing (2022–)
